issues.impact: Significant page load time, especially on mobile
Total image size is 3.5MB - should be < 500KB total

issues.issue: JS bundle is 383KB (124KB gzipped) - could benefit from code splitting

recommendations: Convert all images to WebP/AVIF format
Lazy load images below the fold

Optimize particle background (lazy load or disable on low-end devices)
